1371: Gherolf was born in Cingel in 1371.
1392: Lost sibling Ghisebrecht in 1392 when Ghisebrecht was 17.
Got married to Natelien at age 22 in 1392.
Gherolf moved to Breestraat.A.14 after marriage.
1393: Lost father at the age of 22.
Lost father at the age of 22.
1394: Had a daughter with Natelien, Atghardis, at age 23.
1395: Had a daughter with Natelien, Folqui, at age 24.
1396: Lost his wife Natelien while she was giving birth to Berta in 1396.
Became caretaker of Atghardis, Folqui, Berta at age 26.
Got married a second time to Reynwi at age 26 in 1396.
Had Reynwi move in at Breestraat.A.14 after marriage.
1397: Lost mother at the age of 26.
1398: Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 4 years old.
Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 3 years old.
